CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: reported that n-channel OFET based on a bithiophene imide homopolymer exhibited a μ e of 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , I on / I off of 2 x 10^7 , and a high V th ( 75 V ) in vacuum after annealing process at 240 ° C. 27 The fused - ring system can maximize the π-orbital overlap by restricting intramolecular rotation in the oligomer and possibly to induce face - to - face π-stacking , facilitating charge transport through intermolecular hopping.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. "bithiophene imide homopolymer"
2. "fused-ring system"
3. "oligomer"

So, the three "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Bithiophene imide homopolymer
2. Fused-ring system
3. Oligomer
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the corrected "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Bithiophene imide homopolymer
2. Oligomer

So, the two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Bithiophene imide homopolymer
2. Oligomer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Bithiophene imide homopolymer |
| Oligomer |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: reported that n-channel OFET based on a bithiophene imide homopolymer exhibited a μ e of 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , I on / I off of 2 x 10^7 , and a high V th ( 75 V ) in vacuum after annealing process at 240 ° C. 27 The fused - ring system can maximize the π-orbital overlap by restricting intramolecular rotation in the oligomer and possibly to induce face - to - face π-stacking , facilitating charge transport through intermolecular hopping.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. μ e (mobility)
2. I on / I off (current ratio)
3. V th (threshold voltage)

These are the three properties of the n-channel OFET that are mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the paragraph:

1. μ e (mobility)
2. V th (threshold voltage)

The entity "I on / I off" (current ratio) is not a material property, but rather a performance metric that is related to the material properties of the OFET. Therefore, it is not included in the list of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| μ e (mobility) |
| V th (threshold voltage) |
